attributes.action: Parliment should resign and a general election should be called over the mishandling of the Riots in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned feel that after 3 days of mob rule in London, that is spreading to Birmingham and Liverpool and other areas of the United Kingdom, And the lack of any leadership from the elected Government, That Government should be recalled and on mass resign and a general election should be called. This is a vote of no confidence in those that are meant to be in power.
